@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Central instance pool for event objects. All event objects dispatched by the
event loader are pooled using this class.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Even though this class contains almost no code it is required because the

@description.name: @description
@description.body: legacy code needs a place to patch the event pooling behavior.
